Class BillDAO

java.lang.Object
DataBase.dao.BillDAO
public class BillDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for handling billing operations. Responsibilities:
  • Locate bills by reservation or waiting-list confirmation code
  • Create bills on demand for active visits
  • Process bill payments using database transactions
  • Apply subscriber discounts when applicable
  • Close visits and release occupied tables after payment
  • Support reminder queries for unpaid bills
All database access is performed using MySQLConnectionPool. Transaction safety (commit / rollback) is enforced for payment operations.

  • Method Details

    • insertBill

      public static void insertBill(int visitId, double amount, String discount, String paid) throws Exception
      Inserts a new bill record for a given visit.
      Parameters:
      visitId - the visit identifier
      amount - total bill amount
      discount - subscriber discount flag ("YES"/"NO")
      paid - payment status ("YES"/"NO")
      Throws:
      Exception - if database operation fails

    • getBillByConfirmationCode

      public static BillDAO.BillLookupResult getBillByConfirmationCode(String code) throws Exception
      Retrieves a bill by confirmation code (reservation or waiting list).

      If no bill exists for the active visit, a new bill is created on demand. Handles cases where the bill is already paid.

      Parameters:
      code - confirmation code
      Returns:
      lookup result containing bill data or error status
      Throws:
      Exception - if database access fails

    • payBillByConfirmationCode

      public static BillDAO.PayBillResult payBillByConfirmationCode(String code) throws Exception
      Processes payment for a bill identified by confirmation code.

      This method performs a transactional operation:

      • Marks the bill as paid
      • Ends all active visits for the activity
      • Releases occupied tables
      • Updates reservation or waiting-list status
      Parameters:
      code - confirmation code
      Returns:
      payment result
      Throws:
      Exception - if payment fails or database error occurs

    • findBillsNeedingReminder

      public static List<BillDAO.BillReminderRow> findBillsNeedingReminder(int limit) throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception

    • markReminderSent

      public static void markReminderSent(int billId) throws Exception
      Marks a bill reminder as sent.

      Updates the bill record by setting the reminder flag and storing the timestamp of when the reminder was sent. This method is typically used after sending an email or SMS reminder.

      Parameters:
      billId - the identifier of the bill to update
      Throws:
      Exception - if a database error occurs
